article.title: Aviation Systems Engineering Awarded Contract for Aircraft Equipment Demonstration Support
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Aviation Systems Engineering Company Incorporated has received an indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity contract of $7,967,540 for aircraft equipment demonstration support to test cutting-edge Anti-Submarine Warfare systems during flight demonstrations and fleet exercises. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
